TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingContext extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 為繼承 類別的任何物件管理 物件集合。

span.span: Manages the collection of objects for any object that inherits from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個 Windows Form 至少有一個管理物件表單的物件。Each Windows Form has at least one object that manages the objects for the form. 因為類別是抽象的傳回型別屬性或。Because the class is abstract, the return type of the property is either a or a . 資料來源是否可以傳回的單一屬性 （而不是物件的清單），物件是。If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the is a . 例如，如果您指定做為資料來源，傳回。For example, if you specify a as the data source, a is returned. 另一方面，如果資料來源物件，用於實作或、傳回。On the other hand, if the data source is an object that implements or , a is returned. 在 Windows Form 上每個資料來源，則會有單一或。For each data source on a Windows Form, there is a single or . 因為可能會有多個資料來源相關聯的 Windows Form可讓您擷取任何特定與資料來源相關聯。Because there may be multiple data sources associated with a Windows Form, the enables you to retrieve any particular associated with a data source. > [!NOTE] > 當使用屬性，新建如果不存在。When using the property, the creates a new if one does not already exist. 這可能會導致一些混淆，因為傳回的物件可能不會管理清單 （或任何清單），您想。This can lead to some confusion, as the returned object may not manage the list (or any list) that you intend. 若要避免傳回無效的，使用方法來判斷所需的已經存在。To prevent returning an invalid , use the method to determine if the intended already exists. 如果您使用容器控制項，例如， ，或，包含資料繫結控制項，您可以建立如只要該容器控制項及其子控制項。If you use a container control, such as a , , or , to contain data-bound controls, you can create a for just that container control and its controls. 然後，您的表單中的每個部分可受自己。Then, each part of your form can be managed by its own . 請參閱建構函式，如需有關建立多個相同的資料來源的物件。See the constructor for more information about creating multiple objects for the same data source. 如果您將加入控制項至表單和資料集時，控制項中的資料表資料行與其進行通訊的繫結該表單。If you add a control to a form and bind it to a column of a table in a dataset, the control communicates with the of that form. ，，反過來特定針對該資料關聯。The , in turn, talks to the specific for that data association. 如果您查詢`Position`屬性，它會報告目前的記錄，該繫結控制項。If you queried the `Position` property of the , it would report the current record for the binding of that control. 在下列程式碼範例中，控制項繫結至`FirstName`資料行`Customers`資料表`dataSet1`透過資料集表單上。In the following code example, a control is bound to the `FirstName` column of a `Customers` table on the `dataSet1` dataset through the for the form it is on. ```vb TextBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName") ``` ```csharp textBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` ```cpp textBox1->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` 您可以新增第二個控制項 (`TextBox2`) 加入表單並繫結至`LastName`資料行`Customers`資料表中相同的資料集。You can add a second control (`TextBox2`) to the form and bind it to the `LastName` column of the `Customers` table in the same dataset. 所知的第一個繫結 (`TextBox1`至`Customers.FirstName`)，因此它會使用相同，因為這兩個文字方塊中會繫結至相同的資料集 (`DataSet1`)。The is aware of the first binding (`TextBox1` to `Customers.FirstName`), so it would use the same , as both text boxes are bound to the same dataset (`DataSet1`). ```vb TextBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName") ``` ```csharp textBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` ```cpp textBox2->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` 如果您將繫結`TextBox2`不同資料集，建立及管理第二個。If you bind `TextBox2` to a different dataset, the creates and manages a second . 請務必保持一致，有關如何設定和屬性，否則建立多個貨幣管理員相同的資料集，會導致錯誤。It is important to be consistent about how you set the and properties; otherwise, the creates multiple currency managers for the same dataset, which results in errors. 下列程式碼範例示範幾個方式可設定的內容以及其相關聯物件。The following code example shows a few ways to set the properties and their associated objects. 您可以設定使用下列方法，其中的屬性，只要您是在整個程式碼一致。You can set the properties using either of the following methods, as long as you are consistent throughout your code. ```vb ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1 ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1, "Customers").Position = 1 ``` ```csharp comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1, "Customers"].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1, "Customers")->Position = 1; ``` ```vb ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1.Customers).Position = 1 ``` ```csharp comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1.Customers].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1->Customers; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1->Customers)->Position = 1; ``` > [!NOTE] > 大部分的 Windows Form 應用程式透過繫結。Most Windows Forms applications bind through a . 元件封裝公開程式設計介面。The component encapsulates a and exposes the programming interface. 當使用繫結，您應該使用所公開的成員操作 [貨幣] (也就是`Position`)，而不用。When using a for binding, you should use the members exposed by the to manipulate "currency" (that is, `Position`) rather than go through the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立四個以五個控制項繫結物件 —和第四個控制項 — 至數個資料來源。The following code example creates four objects to bind five controls—a and four controls—to several data sources. 然後用來取得每個資料來源。The is then used to get the for each data source. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要有多個執行個體相同的資料來源，建立新並將它設定為屬性之物件的繼承自類別。If you want to have multiple instances for the same data source, create a new and set it to the property of an object that inherits from the class. 例如，如果您有兩個物件 (從兩個不同物件)，您可以設定的每個屬性為不同的值。For example, if you have two objects (from two different objects), you can set the properties of each to different values. 這會導致資料繫結控制項以顯示相同的資料來源中的不同值的每一組。This causes each set of data-bound controls to display different values from the same data source. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立兩個新物件，並將指派給每一個物件屬性控制項。The following code example creates two new objects and assigns each object to the property of a control. `GroupBox1` 包含`TextBox1`，和`GroupBox2`包含`TextBox2`(這透過使用方法類別)。`GroupBox1` contains `TextBox1`, and `GroupBox2` contains `TextBox2` (which is accomplished by using the method of the class). 此範例會接著將到兩個物件繫結至相同的資料來源和資料成員的每個控制項。The example then adds objects to the two controls, binding each to the same data source and data member. 此範例也示範使用兩個事件處理常式從控制項設定上不同屬性物件。The example also shows two event handlers that use the from the controls to set the property on different objects. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件已經過時，一定會引發時處理。The event is obsolete and always raises a when handled. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用這個多載想不需要導覽路徑。Use this overload if the you want does not require a navigation path. 例如，如果管理一組物件使用或為，任何的導覽路徑為必要項。For example, if the manages a set of objects that use an or as the , no navigation path is required. > [!NOTE] > 屬性一律會傳回，而且永遠不傳回`null`。The property will always return a , and never return `null`. 請參閱類別，如需可能資料來源的清單，以及如需建立控制項與資料來源之間的繫結資訊。See the class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳回三個物件： 一個用於，下列其中一個針對，，另一個用於的屬於控制項。The following code example returns three objects: one for a , one for an , and one for the of a that belongs to a control. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此多載時管理一組資料來源包含多個物件的物件。Use this overload when the manages a set of objects for which the data source contains multiple objects. 例如，只能包含數個所連結的物件物件。For example, a can contain several objects linked by objects. 在這種情況下，瀏覽路徑，才能啟用傳回正確。In such a case, the navigation path is required to enable the to return the correct . > [!NOTE] > 屬性一律會傳回，當`dataMember`參數才有效。The property will always return a , when the `dataMember` parameter is valid. 它永遠不會傳回`null`。It will never return `null`. 請參閱類別，如需可能資料來源的清單，以及如需建立控制項與資料來源之間的繫結資訊。See the class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources. 如果想要的管理清單中，瀏覽路徑必須也會以清單結尾。If the desired manages a list, the navigation path must also end with a list. 例如，下列 C# 程式碼會將繫結訂購日期的 orders 資料表中的控制項。For example, the following C# code binds a control to the order date in a table of orders. 導覽路徑中包含、 ，而。The navigation path includes the , the , and the . 不過，必須使用只抓取和（這會解析為清單）。However, the must be retrieved using only the and (which resolves to a list). ``` // The navigation path for a Binding ends with a property. textBox1.DataBindings.Add ("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"); // The navigation path for the BindingManagerBase ends with a list. BindingManagerBase bmOrders = this.BindingContext [dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders"]; ``` 傳回時，您應該使用相同的資料來源和修改導覽路徑。When returning a , you should use the same data source as the and modify only the navigation path. 使用方法來判斷所需已經存在。Use the method to determine if the desired already exists. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用擷取特定繫結。The following code example demonstrates how to use the to retrieve the for a particular binding. 它也會顯示如何處理事件以確保當控制值的其中一個變更時繫結至相同的資料來源的多個控制項都能保持同步。It also shows how to handle the event for the to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`InitializeControlsAndData`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

Protected Friend Sub Remove (dataSource As Object)
protected public: void Remove(System::Object ^ dataSource);
